item.title: Raspberry Pi Media Server Series #4 – Setting Up Docker
item.description: Introduction This is the forth part of my Raspberry Pi Media Server series. If you haven’t read our previous part, here’s where we discussed setting up external drives on Raspberry Pi. In this part, we are going to setting up Docker on Raspberry Pi. Here’s what you will get if you follow through the end of the tutorial: Docker and Docker Compose installed Docker data will be in the external drives Systemd will only start Docker if external drives are mounted Getting Started Before we get our hands on setting up docker on our Raspberry Pi, let’s first do a system update.
